$interpreted: Nolva: Will you be going back to your room, Sione?
Sione: Oh, I should think so...
Sione: Is there anything else happening at the moment?
Nolva: Well, the attendant was introducing the surroundings to us just now. There's a shopping arcade within the hotel...
Nolva: Wow, it looks real busy~~
Hot Spring Bun Vendor: Hot Spring Buns~ Big 'n' tasty Hot Spring Buns~~
Nolva: Wouldn't a bun get all soggy being in a hot spring? I wanna try one~
Sione: Yeah... or maybe they're dried buns that grow back to size once you boil them?
Sione: (That'd be a good choice to take on a long march...)
Hot Spring Powder Vendor: Keep fit and healthy, use Allspring Powder every day!
Nolva: Look at this hot spring powder, it's like a rainbow in the water~
Sione: Take a bath and rapidly restore your health...!?
Sione: (If this were in common supply back at the barracks, it'd surely give a big boost to our soldiers' morale...)
Sione: (—Oh yeah... I should buy some for Dylan. No doubt he's worrying about me here in the East.)
Nolva: So, I guess we've ended up with a lot more than we bargained for...
Sione: ......
Agitated Guest: Somebody's eating abyssal chilis and facing off the Spice Maiden! Let's go check it out!
Excited Guest: Are they crazy? Who do they think they are!?
Nolva: Spice Maiden? Abyssal chilis?
Nolva: Gosh, what's all this...?
Izumi: Heheh. They're competing to see who can stomach the most spice.
Sione: And you are—the boss of the Spring Waters?
Izumi: Call me Izumi, everybody does~ Is this your first time with us?
Izumi: It's a competition organized by the vendors. Whoever eats the most chili wins~
Izumi: That toady madam up there is known to the underworld as the Spice Maiden—She's the reigning champion at every hot-sauce-eating contest in the region~
Nolva: No wonder she's so famous... Are you here to watch her too, Izumi?
Izumi: Sure am~ It's a real pleasure to watch her put the rest of those suckers through such torture.
Nolva: Huh?
Pained Dog Beast: Hot-hot-hot-hoooot! I... I give up... owowow—
Spice Maiden: Bwaha! There's noone on earth who'll out-spice the Spice Maiden~ You hefty lookin' braggarts are all a buncha good for nothin's!
Spice Maiden: Dogs, Panthers, Wolves, Bulls, Gorillas...
Spice Maiden: And especially you Tigers. One bite and yer as cute as kittens~
Yao: —Who are you calling a kitten?
Nolva: (—It's him again! No wonder...)
Nolva: (No wonder he's here at the hotel, too... Gosh~)
Sione: (He's ferocious...!)
Sione: (I don't think he's any ordinary traveler.)
Izumi: (Ehh? I thought that murderous princeling would keep a low profile while snooping around... but he can't help himself. Those Tigers sure are hot-blooded fools~)
Spice Maiden: Huegh, is that a Tiger? How's about you come prove me wrong? I love great big dolts like you. Just don't come a-cryin' for mercy later~
Yao: I'll make you eat those spicy words of yours.
Spice Contest MC: Excellent! All right, you two...—Let the contest begin!
Yao: Hmph, you giving up now?
Spice Maiden: Ergh...
Yao: Eat it!
Spice Maiden: T-this spicy gal—admits... defeat... owghgh—
Agitated Guest: No way!? The Spice Maiden's seeing stars!
Excited Guest: The might! The bravery! From this day on, the Tiger Tribe have my respect!
Izumi: Incredible~ That guy's got to have a tongue of steel!
Spice Contest MC: What a spicy battle, folks. It's been years since the Maiden's seen such competition...
Spice Contest MC: Sooo~ If there are no more challengers, then this year's champion is—
Spice Contest MC: ...What's this!?
Sione: ...Huh? Nolva!?
Spice Contest MC: Amazing! Who'd ever have thought that a human girl would attempt to snatch this crown!? This newcomer's got no panic about peppers, folks~ Let's give her a big hand for her bravery!
Sione: Wait, looks like there's something not quite right with her...
Sione: —Could she have been... drugged!?
Izumi: Drugged? Come off it~ Look at her, though. She must be sleepwalking~~
Spice Contest MC: Now, Miss, get ready—Chili number one!
Sione: (Victims all instantly lose their ability to move. After losing consciousness for a few days, they wake up again feeble and exhausted...)
Sione: (But that's not how Nolva looks now. So what on earth...)
Nolva: ……………
Nolva: Oof... phew~ Mngh...
Spice Contest MC: Hmm? Miss, are you... snoring?
Yao: Looks like this contest is over.
Agitated Guest: Wait! She's moving!?
Spice Contest MC: ---What did you say!?
Izumi: Ehh? I take it all back~
Izumi: ...What sleepwalker could ever get this far?
Spice Contest MC: Today we'll witness the decider, the final, the ultimate—Spicy Showdown!
Yao: (Oof... guh... When does it end...)
Excited Guest: Ninety-one, ninety-two... I-I've lost count...
Agitated Guest: She's not even sweating! Don't tell me this Tiger's gonna get beat by a human!?
Yao: (—Impossible!)
Nolva: ...Ngh~ Hah... What's this?
Nolva: Huh? A-all these people? What... what's this I'm eating?
Nolva: And why does my tongue feel like it's—
Nolva: ON FIIIRRRREEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!

Model.Text: Will you be going back to your room, Sione?
Oh, I should think so...
Is there anything else happening at the moment?
Well, the attendant was introducing the surroundings to us just now. There's a shopping arcade within the hotel...
Wow, it looks real busy~~
Hot Spring Buns~ Big 'n' tasty Hot Spring Buns~~
Wouldn't a bun get all soggy being in a hot spring? I wanna try one~
Yeah... or maybe they're dried buns that grow back to size once you boil them?
(That'd be a good choice to take on a long march...)
Keep fit and healthy, use Allspring Powder every day!
Look at this hot spring powder, it's like a rainbow in the water~
Take a bath and rapidly restore your health...!?
(If this were in common supply back at the barracks, it'd surely give a big boost to our soldiers' morale...)
(—Oh yeah... I should buy some for Dylan. No doubt he's worrying about me here in the East.)
So, I guess we've ended up with a lot more than we bargained for...
Somebody's eating abyssal chilis and facing off the Spice Maiden! Let's go check it out!
Are they crazy? Who do they think they are!?
Spice Maiden? Abyssal chilis?
Gosh, what's all this...?
Heheh. They're competing to see who can stomach the most spice.
And you are—the boss of the Spring Waters?
Call me Izumi, everybody does~ Is this your first time with us?
It's a competition organized by the vendors. Whoever eats the most chili wins~
That toady madam up there is known to the underworld as the Spice Maiden—She's the reigning champion at every hot-sauce-eating contest in the region~
No wonder she's so famous... Are you here to watch her too, Izumi?
Sure am~ It's a real pleasure to watch her put the rest of those suckers through such torture.
Huh?
Hot-hot-hot-hoooot! I... I give up... owowow—
Bwaha! There's noone on earth who'll out-spice the Spice Maiden~ You hefty lookin' braggarts are all a buncha good for nothin's!
Dogs, Panthers, Wolves, Bulls, Gorillas...
And especially you Tigers. One bite and yer as cute as kittens~
—Who are you calling a kitten?
(—It's him again! No wonder...)
(No wonder he's here at the hotel, too... Gosh~)
(He's ferocious...!)
(I don't think he's any ordinary traveler.)
(Ehh? I thought that murderous princeling would keep a low profile while snooping around... but he can't help himself. Those Tigers sure are hot-blooded fools~)
Huegh, is that a Tiger? How's about you come prove me wrong? I love great big dolts like you. Just don't come a-cryin' for mercy later~
I'll make you eat those spicy words of yours.
Excellent! All right, you two...—Let the contest begin!
Hmph, you giving up now?
Ergh...
Eat it!
T-this spicy gal—admits... defeat... owghgh—
No way!? The Spice Maiden's seeing stars!
The might! The bravery! From this day on, the Tiger Tribe have my respect!
Incredible~ That guy's got to have a tongue of steel!
What a spicy battle, folks. It's been years since the Maiden's seen such competition...
Sooo~ If there are no more challengers, then this year's champion is—
...What's this!?
...Huh? Nolva!?
Amazing! Who'd ever have thought that a human girl would attempt to snatch this crown!? This newcomer's got no panic about peppers, folks~ Let's give her a big hand for her bravery!
Wait, looks like there's something not quite right with her...
—Could she have been... drugged!?
Drugged? Come off it~ Look at her, though. She must be sleepwalking~~
Now, Miss, get ready—Chili number one!
(Victims all instantly lose their ability to move. After losing consciousness for a few days, they wake up again feeble and exhausted...)
(But that's not how Nolva looks now. So what on earth...)
Oof... phew~ Mngh...
Hmm? Miss, are you... snoring?
Looks like this contest is over.
Wait! She's moving!?
---What did you say!?
Ehh? I take it all back~
...What sleepwalker could ever get this far?
Today we'll witness the decider, the final, the ultimate—Spicy Showdown!
(Oof... guh... When does it end...)
Ninety-one, ninety-two... I-I've lost count...
She's not even sweating! Don't tell me this Tiger's gonna get beat by a human!?
(—Impossible!)
...Ngh~ Hah... What's this?
Huh? A-all these people? What... what's this I'm eating?
And why does my tongue feel like it's—
ON FIIIRRRREEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!
